verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

זֹ֤את <S%H2063><s%> likewise תִּֽהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become תּוֹרַ֣ת <S%H8451><s%> This shall be the law הַמְּצֹרָ֔ע <S%H6879><s%> of the leper בְּי֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day טָהֳרָת֑וֹ <S%H2893><s%> of his cleansing וְהוּבָ֖א <S%H935><s%> He shall be brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <S%H3548><s%> unto the priest

וְיָצָא֙ <S%H3318><s%> shall go forth הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מִח֖וּץ <S%H2351><s%> out לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> of the camp וְרָאָה֙ <S%H7200><s%> shall look הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> and the priest וְהִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> and if נִרְפָּ֥א <S%H7495><s%> be healed נֶֽגַע־ <S%H5061><s%> and behold [if] the plague הַצָּרַ֖עַת <S%H6883><s%> of leprosy מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> in הַצָּרֽוּעַ׃ <S%H6879><s%> in the leper

וְצִוָּה֙ <S%H6680><s%> command הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> Then shall the priest וְלָקַ֧ח <S%H3947><s%> to take לַמִּטַּהֵ֛ר <S%H2891><s%> for him that is to be cleansed שְׁתֵּֽי־ <S%H8147><s%> two צִפֳּרִ֥ים <S%H6833><s%> birds חַיּ֖וֹת <S%H2416><s%> alive טְהֹר֑וֹת <S%H2889><s%> [and] clean וְעֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> wood אֶ֔רֶז <S%H730><s%> and cedar וּשְׁנִ֥י <S%H8144><s%> scarlet תוֹלַ֖עַת <S%H8438><s%> oppressor וְאֵזֹֽב׃ <S%H231><s%> and hyssop

וְצִוָּה֙ <S%H6680><s%> shall command הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest וְשָׁחַ֖ט <S%H7819><s%> be killed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַצִּפּ֣וֹר <S%H6833><s%> of the birds הָאֶחָ֑ת <S%H259><s%> that one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about כְּלִי־ <S%H3627><s%> vessel חֶ֖רֶשׂ <S%H2789><s%> in an earthen עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over מַ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> water חַיִּֽים׃ <S%H2416><s%> over running

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַצִּפֹּ֤ר <S%H6833><s%> bird הַֽחַיָּה֙ <S%H2416><s%> As for the living יִקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> he shall take אֹתָ֔הּ <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵ֥ץ <S%H6086><s%> wood הָאֶ֛רֶז <S%H730><s%> it and the cedar וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁנִ֥י <S%H8144><s%> and the scarlet הַתּוֹלַ֖עַת <S%H8438><s%> oppressor וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֵזֹ֑ב <S%H231><s%> and the hyssop וְטָבַ֨ל <S%H2881><s%> and shall dip אוֹתָ֜ם <S%H853><s%> וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H853><s%> הַצִּפֹּ֣ר <S%H6833><s%> bird הַֽחַיָּ֗ה <S%H2416><s%> them and the living בְּדַם֙ <S%H1818><s%> in the blood הַצִּפֹּ֣ר <S%H6833><s%> of the bird הַשְּׁחֻטָ֔ה <S%H7819><s%> [that was] killed עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> over הַמַּ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> water הַֽחַיִּֽים׃ <S%H2416><s%> over the running

וְהִזָּ֗ה <S%H5137><s%> And he shall sprinkle עַ֧ל <S%H5921><s%> over הַמִּטַּהֵ֛ר <S%H2891><s%> upon him that is to be cleansed מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַצָּרַ֖עַת <S%H6883><s%> from the leprosy שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven פְּעָמִ֑ים <S%H6471><s%> times וְטִ֣הֲר֔וֹ <S%H2891><s%> and shall pronounce him clean וְשִׁלַּ֛ח <S%H7971><s%> loose אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַצִּפֹּ֥ר <S%H6833><s%> bird הַֽחַיָּ֖ה <S%H2416><s%> and shall let the living עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> into the open הַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <S%H7704><s%> field

וְכִבֶּס֩ <S%H3526><s%> shall wash הַמִּטַּהֵ֨ר <S%H2891><s%> And he that is to be cleansed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּגָדָ֜יו <S%H899><s%> his clothes וְגִלַּ֣ח <S%H1548><s%> and shave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שְׂעָר֗וֹ <S%H8181><s%> off all his hair וְרָחַ֤ץ <S%H7364><s%> and wash בַּמַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> himself in water וְטָהֵ֔ר <S%H2891><s%> that he may be clean וְאַחַ֖ר <S%H310><s%> and after יָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> that he shall come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> into the camp וְיָשַׁ֛ב <S%H3427><s%> and shall tarry מִח֥וּץ <S%H2351><s%> abroad לְאָהֳל֖וֹ <S%H168><s%> out of his tent שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> seven יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> days

וְהָיָה֩ <S%H1961><s%> become בַיּ֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֜י <S%H7637><s%> But it shall be on the seventh יְגַלַּ֣ח <S%H1548><s%> that he shall shave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שְׂעָר֗וֹ <S%H8181><s%> all his hair אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֹאשׁ֤וֹ <S%H7218><s%> off his head וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זְקָנוֹ֙ <S%H2206><s%> and his beard וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> גַּבֹּ֣ת <S%H1354><s%> top עֵינָ֔יו <S%H5869><s%> affliction וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שְׂעָר֖וֹ <S%H8181><s%> even all his hair יְגַלֵּ֑חַ <S%H1548><s%> he shall shave וְכִבֶּ֣ס <S%H3526><s%> off and he shall wash אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּגָדָ֗יו <S%H899><s%> his clothes וְרָחַ֧ץ <S%H7364><s%> also he shall wash אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּשָׂר֛וֹ <S%H1320><s%> his flesh בַּמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> in water וְטָהֵֽר׃ <S%H2891><s%> and he shall be clean

וּבַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁמִינִ֗י <S%H8066><s%> And on the eighth יִקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> he shall take שְׁנֵֽי־ <S%H8147><s%> two כְבָשִׂים֙ <S%H3532><s%> he lambs תְּמִימִ֔ים <S%H8549><s%> without blemish וְכַבְשָׂ֥ה <S%H3535><s%> ewe lamb אַחַ֛ת <S%H259><s%> and one בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> of the first שְׁנָתָ֖הּ <S%H8141><s%> year תְּמִימָ֑ה <S%H8549><s%> without blemish וּשְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> and three עֶשְׂרֹנִ֗ים <S%H6241><s%> tenth deals סֹ֤לֶת <S%H5560><s%> of fine flour מִנְחָה֙ <S%H4503><s%> [for] a meat offering בְּלוּלָ֣ה <S%H1101><s%> mingled בַשֶּׁ֔מֶן <S%H8081><s%> with oil וְלֹ֥ג <S%H3849><s%> log אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> and one שָֽׁמֶן׃ <S%H8081><s%> of oil

וְהֶעֱמִ֞יד <S%H5975><s%> shall present הַכֹּהֵ֣ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest הַֽמְטַהֵ֗ר <S%H2891><s%> that maketh [him] clean אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> הָאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> the man הַמִּטַּהֵ֖ר <S%H2891><s%> that is to be made clean וְאֹתָ֑ם <S%H854><s%> and the aforesaid לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> and those things before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> [at] the door אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation

וְלָקַ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> shall take הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֶּ֣בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> he lamb הָאֶחָ֗ד <S%H259><s%> one וְהִקְרִ֥יב <S%H7126><s%> and offer אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> לְאָשָׁ֖ם <S%H817><s%> him for a trespass offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לֹ֣ג <S%H3849><s%> and the log הַשָּׁ֑מֶן <S%H8081><s%> of oil וְהֵנִ֥יף <S%H5130><s%> and wave אֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> תְּנוּפָ֖ה <S%H8573><s%> them [for] a wave offering לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וְשָׁחַ֣ט <S%H7819><s%> And he shall slay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֶּ֗בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> the lamb בִּ֠מְקוֹם <S%H4725><s%> in the place אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> where יִשְׁחַ֧ט <S%H7819><s%> where he shall kill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽחַטָּ֛את <S%H2403><s%> the sin offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> and the burnt offering בִּמְק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> place הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> in the holy כִּ֡י <S%H3588><s%> for כַּ֠חַטָּאת <S%H2403><s%> for as the sin offering הָאָשָׁ֥ם <S%H817><s%> [so is] the trespass offering הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he לַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> [is] the priest's קֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> it [is] most קָֽדָשִׁ֖ים <S%H6944><s%> holy הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וְלָקַ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> shall take הַכֹּהֵן֮ <S%H3548><s%> And the priest מִדַּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> [some] of the blood הָאָשָׁם֒ <S%H817><s%> of the trespass offering וְנָתַן֙ <S%H5414><s%> shall put הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> and the priest עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on תְּנ֛וּךְ <S%H8571><s%> [it] upon the tip אֹ֥זֶן <S%H241><s%> ear הַמִּטַּהֵ֖ר <S%H2891><s%> of him that is to be cleansed הַיְמָנִ֑ית <S%H3233><s%> of the right וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on בֹּ֤הֶן <S%H931><s%> and upon the thumb יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> hand הַיְמָנִ֔ית <S%H3233><s%> of his right וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on בֹּ֥הֶן <S%H931><s%> and upon the great toe רַגְל֖וֹ <S%H7272><s%> foot הַיְמָנִֽית׃ <S%H3233><s%> of his right

וְלָקַ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> shall take הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest מִלֹּ֣ג <S%H3849><s%> [some] of the log הַשָּׁ֑מֶן <S%H8081><s%> of oil וְיָצַ֛ק <S%H3332><s%> and pour עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כַּ֥ף <S%H3709><s%> [it] into the palm הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> of his own הַשְּׂמָאלִֽית׃ <S%H8042><s%> left hand

וְטָבַ֤ל <S%H2881><s%> shall dip הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> And the priest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶצְבָּע֣וֹ <S%H676><s%> finger הַיְמָנִ֔ית <S%H3233><s%> his right מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> some הַשֶּׁ֕מֶן <S%H8081><s%> in the oil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כַּפּ֖וֹ <S%H3709><s%> hand הַשְּׂמָאלִ֑ית <S%H8042><s%> that [is] in his left וְהִזָּ֨ה <S%H5137><s%> and shall sprinkle מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> some הַשֶּׁ֧מֶן <S%H8081><s%> of the oil בְּאֶצְבָּע֛וֹ <S%H676><s%> with his finger שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven פְּעָמִ֖ים <S%H6471><s%> times לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וּמִיֶּ֨תֶר <S%H3499><s%> And of the rest הַשֶּׁ֜מֶן <S%H8081><s%> of the oil אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is in כַּפּ֗וֹ <S%H3709><s%> that [is] in his hand יִתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> put הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> shall the priest עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and תְּנ֞וּךְ <S%H8571><s%> upon the tip אֹ֤זֶן <S%H241><s%> ear הַמִּטַּהֵר֙ <S%H2891><s%> of him that is to be cleansed הַיְמָנִ֔ית <S%H3233><s%> of the right וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on בֹּ֤הֶן <S%H931><s%> and upon the thumb יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> hand הַיְמָנִ֔ית <S%H3233><s%> of his right וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on בֹּ֥הֶן <S%H931><s%> and upon the great toe רַגְל֖וֹ <S%H7272><s%> foot הַיְמָנִ֑ית <S%H3233><s%> of his right עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> on דַּ֥ם <S%H1818><s%> upon the blood הָאָשָֽׁם׃ <S%H817><s%> of the trespass offering

וְהַנּוֹתָ֗ר <S%H3498><s%> And the remnant בַּשֶּׁ֙מֶן֙ <S%H8081><s%> of the oil אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> his עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> behalf כַּ֣ף <S%H3709><s%> hand הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> that [is] in the priest's יִתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> he shall pour עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> his behalf רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> upon the head הַמִּטַּהֵ֑ר <S%H2891><s%> of him that is to be cleansed וְכִפֶּ֥ר <S%H3722><s%> shall make an atonement עָלָ֛יו <S%H5921><s%> his behalf הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> and the priest לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> for him before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וְעָשָׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> shall offer הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> And the priest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַ֣חַטָּ֔את <S%H2403><s%> the sin offering וְכִפֶּ֕ר <S%H3722><s%> and make an atonement עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> the one הַמִּטַּהֵ֖ר <S%H2891><s%> for him that is to be cleansed מִטֻּמְאָת֑וֹ <S%H2932><s%> from his uncleanness וְאַחַ֖ר <S%H310><s%> and afterward יִשְׁחַ֥ט <S%H7819><s%> he shall kill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֹלָֽה׃ <S%H5930><s%> the burnt offering

וְהֶעֱלָ֧ה <S%H5927><s%> shall offer הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֹלָ֥ה <S%H5930><s%> the burnt offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּנְחָ֖ה <S%H4503><s%> and the meat offering הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חָה <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar וְכִפֶּ֥ר <S%H3722><s%> shall make an atonement עָלָ֛יו <S%H5921><s%> and הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> and the priest וְטָהֵֽר׃ <S%H2891><s%> for him and he shall be clean ס

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if דַּ֣ל <S%H1800><s%> And if he [be] poor ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> else יָדוֹ֮ <S%H3027><s%> and his means מַשֶּׂגֶת֒ <S%H5381><s%> are insufficient וְ֠לָקַח <S%H3947><s%> so much then he shall take כֶּ֣בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> lamb אֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> one אָשָׁ֛ם <S%H817><s%> [for] a trespass offering לִתְנוּפָ֖ה <S%H8573><s%> to be waved לְכַפֵּ֣ר <S%H3722><s%> to make an atonement עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> and וְעִשָּׂר֨וֹן <S%H6241><s%> tenth deal סֹ֜לֶת <S%H5560><s%> of fine flour אֶחָ֨ד <S%H259><s%> for him and one בָּל֥וּל <S%H1101><s%> mingled בַּשֶּׁ֛מֶן <S%H8081><s%> with oil לְמִנְחָ֖ה <S%H4503><s%> for a meat offering וְלֹ֥ג <S%H3849><s%> and a log שָֽׁמֶן׃ <S%H8081><s%> of oil

וּשְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> And two תֹרִ֗ים <S%H8449><s%> turtledoves א֤וֹ <S%H176><s%> or שְׁנֵי֙ <S%H8147><s%> or two בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> young יוֹנָ֔ה <S%H3123><s%> pigeons אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which תַּשִּׂ֖יג <S%H5381><s%> are within יָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his means וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> and the one חַטָּ֔את <S%H2403><s%> shall be a sin offering וְהָאֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> and the other עֹלָֽה׃ <S%H5930><s%> a burnt offering

וְהֵבִ֨יא <S%H935><s%> And he shall bring אֹתָ֜ם <S%H853><s%> בַּיּ֧וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁמִינִ֛י <S%H8066><s%> them on the eighth לְטָהֳרָת֖וֹ <S%H2893><s%> for his cleansing אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <S%H3548><s%> unto the priest אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at פֶּ֥תַח <S%H6607><s%> unto the door אֹֽהֶל־ <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וְלָקַ֧ח <S%H3947><s%> shall take הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כֶּ֥בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> the lamb הָאָשָׁ֖ם <S%H817><s%> of the trespass offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לֹ֣ג <S%H3849><s%> and the log הַשָּׁ֑מֶן <S%H8081><s%> of oil וְהֵנִ֨יף <S%H5130><s%> shall wave אֹתָ֧ם <S%H853><s%> הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> and the priest תְּנוּפָ֖ה <S%H8573><s%> them [for] a wave offering לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וְשָׁחַט֮ <S%H7819><s%> And he shall kill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כֶּ֣בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> the lamb הָֽאָשָׁם֒ <S%H817><s%> of the trespass offering וְלָקַ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> shall take הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> and the priest מִדַּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> [some] of the blood הָֽאָשָׁ֔ם <S%H817><s%> of the trespass offering וְנָתַ֛ן <S%H5414><s%> and put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on תְּנ֥וּךְ <S%H8571><s%> [it] upon the tip אֹֽזֶן־ <S%H241><s%> ear הַמִּטַּהֵ֖ר <S%H2891><s%> of him that is to be cleansed הַיְמָנִ֑ית <S%H3233><s%> of the right וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on בֹּ֤הֶן <S%H931><s%> and upon the thumb יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> hand הַיְמָנִ֔ית <S%H3233><s%> of his right וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on בֹּ֥הֶן <S%H931><s%> and upon the great toe רַגְל֖וֹ <S%H7272><s%> foot הַיְמָנִֽית׃ <S%H3233><s%> of his right

וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> some הַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> of the oil יִצֹ֣ק <S%H3332><s%> shall pour הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כַּ֥ף <S%H3709><s%> into the palm הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> of his own הַשְּׂמָאלִֽית׃ <S%H8042><s%> left hand

וְהִזָּ֤ה <S%H5137><s%> shall sprinkle הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> And the priest בְּאֶצְבָּע֣וֹ <S%H676><s%> finger הַיְמָנִ֔ית <S%H3233><s%> with his right מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> some הַשֶּׁ֕מֶן <S%H8081><s%> [some] of the oil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כַּפּ֖וֹ <S%H3709><s%> hand הַשְּׂמָאלִ֑ית <S%H8042><s%> that [is] in his left שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven פְּעָמִ֖ים <S%H6471><s%> times לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וְנָתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> shall put הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> some הַשֶּׁ֣מֶן ׀ <S%H8081><s%> of the oil אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is in כַּפּ֗וֹ <S%H3709><s%> that [is] in his hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on תְּנ֞וּךְ <S%H8571><s%> upon the tip אֹ֤זֶן <S%H241><s%> ear הַמִּטַּהֵר֙ <S%H2891><s%> of him that is to be cleansed הַיְמָנִ֔ית <S%H3233><s%> of the right וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on בֹּ֤הֶן <S%H931><s%> and upon the thumb יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> hand הַיְמָנִ֔ית <S%H3233><s%> of his right וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on בֹּ֥הֶן <S%H931><s%> and upon the great toe רַגְל֖וֹ <S%H7272><s%> foot הַיְמָנִ֑ית <S%H3233><s%> of his right עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מְק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> upon the place דַּ֥ם <S%H1818><s%> of the blood הָאָשָֽׁם׃ <S%H817><s%> of the trespass offering

וְהַנּוֹתָ֗ר <S%H3498><s%> And the rest מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַשֶּׁ֙מֶן֙ <S%H8081><s%> of the oil אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> his עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> behalf כַּ֣ף <S%H3709><s%> hand הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> that [is] in the priest's יִתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> he shall put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> his behalf רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> upon the head הַמִּטַּהֵ֑ר <S%H2891><s%> of him that is to be cleansed לְכַפֵּ֥ר <S%H3722><s%> to make an atonement עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> his behalf לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> for him before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וְעָשָׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> And he shall offer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽאֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> the one מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַתֹּרִ֔ים <S%H8449><s%> of the turtledoves א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> or מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> or of the young הַיּוֹנָ֑ה <S%H3123><s%> pigeons מֵאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> such as תַּשִּׂ֖יג <S%H5381><s%> are within יָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> his means

אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what תַּשִּׂ֞יג <S%H5381><s%> is able to get יָד֗וֹ <S%H3027><s%> [Even] such as he אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> the one חַטָּ֛את <S%H2403><s%> [for] a sin offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> and the other עֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> [for] a burnt offering עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> together הַמִּנְחָ֑ה <S%H4503><s%> with the meat offering וְכִפֶּ֧ר <S%H3722><s%> shall make an atonement הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> and the priest עַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> behalf הַמִּטַּהֵ֖ר <S%H2891><s%> for him that is to be cleansed לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

זֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> likewise תּוֹרַ֔ת <S%H8451><s%> This [is] the law אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom בּ֖וֹ נֶ֣גַע <S%H5061><s%> [of him] in whom [is] the plague צָרָ֑עַת <S%H6883><s%> of leprosy אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> whose לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תַשִּׂ֥יג <S%H5381><s%> is not able to get יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> whose hand בְּטָהֳרָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H2893><s%> [that which pertaineth] to his cleansing פ

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> and to אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> and unto Aaron לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> When תָבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> When ye be come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land כְּנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> I נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> which I give לָכֶ֖ם לַאֲחֻזָּ֑ה <S%H272><s%> to you for a possession וְנָתַתִּי֙ <S%H5414><s%> and I put נֶ֣גַע <S%H5061><s%> the plague צָרַ֔עַת <S%H6883><s%> of leprosy בְּבֵ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> in a house אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land אֲחֻזַּתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H272><s%> of your possession

וּבָא֙ <S%H935><s%> shall come אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who ל֣וֹ הַבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> And he that owneth the house וְהִגִּ֥יד <S%H5046><s%> and tell לַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying כְּנֶ֕גַע <S%H5061><s%> to me [there is] as it were a plague נִרְאָ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> It seemeth לִ֖י בַּבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> in the house

וְצִוָּ֨ה <S%H6680><s%> shall command הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> Then the priest וּפִנּ֣וּ <S%H6437><s%> that they empty אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבַּ֗יִת <S%H1004><s%> the house בְּטֶ֨רֶם <S%H2962><s%> before יָבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> go הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> before the priest לִרְא֣וֹת <S%H7200><s%> [into it] to see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנֶּ֔גַע <S%H5061><s%> the plague וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִטְמָ֖א <S%H2930><s%> be not made unclean כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> everything אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> it בַּבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> that all that [is] in the house וְאַ֥חַר <S%H310><s%> and afterward כֵּ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> after that יָבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> shall go הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest לִרְא֥וֹת <S%H7200><s%> in to see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> the house

וְרָאָ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> And he shall look אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנֶּ֗גַע <S%H5061><s%> on the plague וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> and if הַנֶּ֙גַע֙ <S%H5061><s%> and behold [if] the plague בְּקִירֹ֣ת <S%H7023><s%> [be] in the walls הַבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house שְׁקַֽעֲרוּרֹת֙ <S%H8258><s%> with hollow strakes יְרַקְרַקֹּ֔ת <S%H3422><s%> greenish א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> or אֲדַמְדַּמֹּ֑ת <S%H125><s%> or reddish וּמַרְאֵיהֶ֥ן <S%H4758><s%> which in sight שָׁפָ֖ל <S%H8217><s%> [are] lower מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> than הַקִּֽיר׃ <S%H7023><s%> the wall

וְיָצָ֧א <S%H3318><s%> shall go הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> Then the priest מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> out הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> out of the house אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פֶּ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> to the door הַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house וְהִסְגִּ֥יר <S%H5462><s%> and shut אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> up the house שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> seven יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> days
